mapper.select: SELECT package_id, user_id, package_status, package_content, package_regdate, package_title, package_cost, package_maxpeople, package_start_day, package_end_day FROM package WHERE city_id = #{cityId} ORDER BY package_regdate DESC
SELECT * FROM package WHERE package_title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%')
mapper.update: UPDATE package SET city_id = #{cityId}, package_content = #{packageContent}, package_title = #{packageTitle}, package_cost = #{packageCost}, package_maxpeople = #{packageMaxpeople}, package_start_day = #{packageStartDay}, package_end_day = #{packageEndDay} WHERE package_id = #{packageId}
mapper.select: SELECT pk.package_id AS packageId, pk.package_title AS packageTitle, pk.package_content AS packageContent, pk.package_status AS packageStatus, COALESCE(liked_count.cnt, 0) AS likedCount FROM package pk LEFT JOIN ( SELECT package_id, COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM package_liked GROUP BY package_id ) liked_count ON pk.package_id = liked_count.package_id WHERE pk.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY pk.package_id DESC

SELECT p.package_id, p.package_title, p.package_content, p.package_cost, p.package_maxpeople, p.package_regdate, p.package_start_day, p.package_end_day, c.city_name FROM package p JOIN city c ON p.city_id = c.city_id
